title: Pasteur's experiments
creator_credit: Masaji Hara, Yasuaki Okada and Gakken Company
brief_description: A puppet film which shows the history of experiments dealing with the spontaneous generation of life. Demonstrates that microbes do not arise spontaneously from meat. Good for showing the experimental method.
creator_credit_for_label: Masaji Hara, Yasuaki Okada and Gakken Company
